title: A Tribute To Queen…
cleaned_text:
On the eve of the funeral for Queen Elizabeth II, the prime minister of Canada Justin Trudeau decided to belt out a tribute to the band Queen with his very own rendition of the classic Queen song Bohemian Rhapsody.

Meanwhile in the US president Joe Biden has declared that the Covid-19(84) pandemic is over, despite there still being thousands of workers who are still being fired to this day because they refused to go along with the global vaccination program.

In this video Dan Dicks of Press For Truth cuts through the headlines to cover what may go unnoticed as a result of the Queens funeral which is dominating the headlines.

If you appreciate my efforts please consider making a contribution here:

Or you can send an e-transfer to dan@pressfortruth.ca

If you’re old fashioned like we are and prefer to keep it old school, we also accept cash, cheques, equipment and words of encouragement! You can send us those things here:
